address.name: Server address
address.description: The IP address of the machine running the game. On console, this can be found in ''System Settings > Internet''.

port.name: Server port
port.description: The port the server is running on. Leave as ''5001'' if unsure.

proxy.name: Proxy URL
proxy.description: The URL of the WebSocket proxy server. Leave as ''ws://localhost:5002'' if unsure.
